thread.title: Melbourne bar slammed on Facebook for its homophobic menu

title: Melbourne bar slammed on Facebook for its homophobic menu
text:
Melbourne bar slammed on Facebook for its 'homophobic' menu 
Daily Mail Sunday 25th October, 2015 
A bar has come under fire after it erected a sign that read 'no poofter drinks,' leaving many furious patrons labelling the popular watering hole as homophobic....
